description.b: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a database connection.

item.title: Set the Database Connection metadata
item.description: This steps opens the "Database Connection" wizard. Right click on the folder "Metadata/DB Connections" and select the menu "Create a new Connection" (or the link below). This wizard creates a connection on your DBMS ( DataBase Management System). At the end, the content of all available databases is displayed in the "DQ Repository" view. Even when you give a specific database name, all the content available to you on the connection is displayed. This allows you to explore the content of a database even when you don't know all the names of the catalogs (or schema).
